content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Department Store Swindle Matter, from Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar. That episode was first heard December 24, 1949.

(30:40) Night Beat brings us our second story with theirs from December 21, 1951. It’s titled, Five Days Off For Christmas.

Download CaseClosed719

Your support powers this and all of the Relic Radio podcasts. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
